import React, { Fragment, useState } from 'react' import {createPet} from '../../../actions/petActs' import PropTypes from 'prop-types' import {connect} from 'react-redux' import {withRouter} from 'react-router-dom' import Dropzone from '../../imageSetting/Dropezone' import Cropper from 'react-easy-crop' import getCroppedImg from '../../imageSetting/cropImage' import spinner from '../../../img/spinner.gif' import PetImage from '../petImage' import Grid from '@material-ui/core/Grid' const CreatePetProfile = ({createPet, history}) => { const [images, setImages] = useState([{ src:'', info:'' } ]) const [petFormData, setPetFormData] = useState({ name:'', sex:'', type:'', race:'', age:null, descreption:'', traind:false, cost:'' }) const getBase64 = (image) => { return new Promise((resolve,reject) => { const reader = new FileReader(); reader.onload = () => resolve(reader.result); reader.onerror = error => reject(error); reader.readAsDataURL(image) })} const onDrop =async e =>{ setImages([ ...images,{ id: images.length, src: await getBase64(e[0]), info: '' } ]) console.log(images) } const onChange = e =>{ setPetFormData({...petFormData, [e.target.name]: e.target.value}) } const addInfo = (e, id) =>{ const photos = images photos[id] = e.target.value setImages(photos) } const sentData = e =>{ e.preventDefault() createPet(petFormData, history) } return (
